Label.Script: ノベルシステム\メッセージボックス\終了待ち.lsb
メッセージボックス作成.lsb

Event.EventArg: "Saint Lyn Sacrifices Herself for the Coming of Spirit Demea"
The Wellston Kingdom is where we lay our scene. In the era of the
fourth King, the Kingdom dominated the land of Palas. Then, an
ancient evil awoke: a terrible dragon descended from Heaven's
Spiral Peak, slaughtering the people and leaving many villages
It was in this chaotic time that Princess Lyn was born into royalty.
Since ancient times, it has been tradition to designate a
"Sacrificial Princess" in times of crisis; a Princess that would be offered to the Great
Spirit Demea as a prayer for her to descend to the mortals and save them.
But for fear of losing his daughter, the King disguised his daughter as a man;
the Princess was hidden away in the castle and raised to be a Prince instead.
For over ten years, the wicked dragon ravaged the land of Palas, reducing entire swathes of land to ash.
Though Princess Lyn was raised as a man in a closed-off garden, even she had
heard of the country's dire state. She escaped the castle and revealed to all
that she was really a woman. She bravely offered herself as a Sacrifical
Princess, bringing about the coming of the Great Spirit Demea.
Demea descended to Earth, and overwhelmed the flames of the wicked dragon
with the Fire of Life. She sealed the fell beast upon the peak of Heaven's Wheel Mountain.
Though the day was saved, the Wellston royal family mysteriously died out. As they perished,
the Wellston Kingdom passed into history, the Palas region fracturing into many warring city-states.
Later, these city-states aligned under a coalition led by the Holy City Pallant, and these
states eventually came to be a part of the Midlia Kingdom in the center of the continent.

People stared her down from all directions, eyeing every inch of her body.
